item.title: 罗马尼亚央行行长将降息谈话推向夏季
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行回绝了任何关于提前开始降息的预期，表示由于通胀前景恶化，将延长谨慎期。【原文：Romania’s central bank pushed back against any expectations of an early start to interest rate cuts, signaling an extended period of caution due to a worsening inflation outlook.】

item.title: 莫迪在各州民调中取得压倒性胜利，为他在艰难的一年中注入了活力
item.description: 印度人民党领导的执政联盟在至关重要的比哈尔邦选举中取得压倒性胜利，再次肯定了总理纳伦德拉-莫迪的声望，并增强了他推进艰难经济改革的能力。【原文：India’s ruling alliance led by Bharatiya Janata Party, scored a landslide victory in the crucial Bihar election, reaffirming Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s popularity and boosting his ability to push through tough economic reforms.】

item.title: 台币远期因承诺避免外汇操纵而跳涨
item.description: 根据台湾中央银行和美国财政部就汇率政策发表的联合声明，台湾中央银行誓言避免操纵汇率。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank vowed to avoid manipulating exchange rates, according to a joint statement on exchange rate policies by Taiwan’s central bank and the US Treasury Department.】

item.title: 加拿大最大养老金收益率达 5.4% 归功于股票和绿卡
item.description: 在股票和美元走强的推动下，加拿大养老金计划投资委员会上一季度的回报率为 5.4%。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board returned 5.4% in the last quarter, boosted by stocks and the strong US dollar.】

item.title: 波音公司在迪拜 300 架飞机订单中遥遥领先，但空中客车公司仍有机会
item.description: 波音公司将赢得杜拜航空公司的大部分单通道飞机大订单，但空中客车公司仍有很大机会从这家从未向欧洲飞机制造商订购过飞机的航空公司撬动一些业务。【原文：Boeing Co. stands to win most of a major order from Flydubai for single-aisle aircraft, though Airbus SE still has a long-shot chance to pry some business from an airline that’s never ordered from the European planemaker.】

item.title: 印度将在三年后恢复小麦产品出口
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，在受到三年多的限制之后，印度正在考虑恢复小麦产品的出口，原因是当地供应充足，而且预期收成良好。【原文：India is considering resuming exports of wheat products after more than three years of restrictions, supported by ample local supplies and expectations of a strong crop, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国计划在未来几年加强财政政策应对经济放缓
item.description: 据中国国家媒体新华社周五报道，中国财政部部长蓝佛安承诺在未来五年实施更加有力和积极的财政政策，以支持中国的经济增长。【原文：China’s Finance Minister Lan Fo’an pledged to implement a stronger and proactive fiscal policy over the next five years in an effort to support the country’s economic growth, state media Xinhua News Agency reported on Friday.】

item.title: 美国市场动荡消退，企业缩减货币对冲规模
item.description: 由于对贸易和货币政策的前景不确定，美国和英国的企业在今年年初将货币对冲措施提高到创纪录的水平后，在第三季度又削减了货币对冲措施。【原文：Unsure about the outlook for trade and monetary policy, companies in the US and the UK slashed their currency hedges in the third quarter after boosting them to a record earlier this year.】

item.title: 对 "蚕食 "的担忧困扰着寻求 ETF 生命线的选股人
item.description: 投资者正将资金投入主动型 ETF，但仔细观察就会发现，是资产向主动型 ETF 转移，而不是追逐阿尔法的赌注重新抬头。【原文：Investors are pouring money into active ETFs, but a closer look reveals a migration of assets into the wrapper instead of a resurgence in alpha-chasing bets.】

item.title: 非洲供应前景光明，可可跌势加剧
item.description: 由于头号生产国象牙海岸的供应前景有所改善，可可在纽约市场大幅下跌，出现了第三周下跌。【原文：Cocoa fell sharply in New York, headed for a third weekly loss, on the back of improved prospects for supplies from top producer Ivory Coast.】

item.title: 上交所股票因新的增长路线图而迎来 2000 年以来最好的一周
item.description: 一家英国发电公司概述了其耗资 330 亿英镑（430 亿美元）的电网改造计划，以适应可再生能源的快速扩张，这使得该股有望在本周创下四分之一个世纪以来的最佳表现。【原文：A British power generator’s outline of its £33 billion ($43 billion) plan to overhaul grids and accommodate the rapid expansion of renewable energy has put the stock on track for its best week in a quarter-century.】

item.title: 红鸟斥资 5 亿英镑竞购英国《每日电讯报
item.description: 在英国《每日电讯报》员工的强烈反对下，红鸟资本合伙公司（RedBird Capital Partners）撤回了5亿英镑（约合6.58亿美元）收购《每日电讯报》传媒集团的出价。【原文：RedBird Capital Partners has withdrawn its £500 million ($658 million) bid to buy the Telegraph Media Group amid a backlash from the UK newspaper’s own staff.】

item.title: 塞内加尔告诉投资者它致力于国际货币基金组织（IMF）谈判和偿还债务
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一封发给投资者的信，塞内加尔重申了与国际货币基金组织正在进行的会谈的承诺，并保证继续履行其债务义务。【原文：Senegal reaffirmed its commitment to ongoing talks with the International Monetary Fund and pledged to continue meeting its debt obligations, according to a letter sent to investors and seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 墨西哥亿万富翁诈骗案间谍因卧底而遭抨击
item.description: 墨西哥亿万富翁团队聘请的一家企业情报公司在一次酒后晚宴上秘密录制了一名反对派律师的谈话，以获取证据，帮助其在无需庭审的情况下赢得伦敦诉讼。【原文：A corporate intelligence firm hired by a Mexican billionaire’s team secretly recorded an opposition lawyer over a drink-fueled dinner in a bid to get evidence to help it win a London lawsuit without needing a trial.】

item.title: 石油盈余在增加，但地缘政治风险也在增加
item.description: 尽管供过于求的情况十分严重，但市场仍面临坎坷的走低之路。【原文：Markets face a rocky road lower despite the huge oversupply.】

item.title: 摩根大通平托表示，美联储将于下月就巴塞尔协议与银行首席财务官会面
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.副主席丹尼尔-平托（Daniel Pinto）表示。【原文：The Federal Reserve will meet the chief financial officers of big US banks next month to detail its updated plans for implementing international capital standards, said JPMorgan Chase & Co. Vice Chairman Daniel Pinto.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空将在飞机上安装 "星链 "系统，为 SpaceX 带来重大胜利
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿联酋航空正计划利用 SpaceX 的 Starlink 升级其机队的机载 Wi-Fi 服务，尽管该服务目前尚未获得政府批准。【原文：Emirates is planning to use SpaceX’s Starlink to upgrade the onboard Wi-Fi in its fleet, according to people familiar with the matter, even though the service isn’t currently approved by the government.】

item.title: 默克将以 92 亿美元收购 Cidara，销售额下降迫在眉睫
item.description: 默克公司同意收购一家开发流感治疗药物的生物技术公司 Cidara Therapeutics Inc.【原文：Merck & Co. agreed to acquire Cidara Therapeutics Inc., a biotech company developing a flu treatment, as part of its ongoing efforts to make up for the upcoming patent loss of its blockbuster cancer drug Keytruda.】

item.title: 妄想型聊天机器人用户可能陷入 "二人崇拜 "漩涡
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，埃伦-休特（Ellen Huet）将探讨那些与人工智能聊天机器人产生妄想关系的人的行为与那些加入邪教的人的行为之间的相似之处。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ellen Huet looks at the parallels between the behavior of people who developed a delusional relationship with an AI chatbot and those who joined a cult.】

item.title: 苹果和三星新款 XR 耳机争夺狭小市场
item.description:
三星的 Galaxy XR 价格更低、重量更轻，但性能不如苹果的 Vision Pro。【原文：

Samsung’s Galaxy XR is a cheaper and lighter, but inferior rival to Apple’s Vision Pro.

】

item.title: 摩根士丹利迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）谈逆向看涨与信念
item.description:
这位华尔街明星战略家解释了为什么逆流而上是他的安乐窝。【原文：

The Wall Street star strategist explains why going against the crowd is his comfort zone.

】

item.title: 大科技公司的统治取决于我们的懒惰
item.description:
Facebook、Google、Amazon 和其他平台在创造便利性方面投入了巨资，这使得用户在转投竞争对手时感到举步维艰。【原文：

Facebook, Google, Amazon and other platforms have invested heavily in creating convenience cocoons that make switching to competitors feel like too much of a heavy lift.

】

item.title: 到本世纪末，非洲将需要十亿个工作岗位
item.description: 当发达经济体担心自己变老的时候，非洲却越来越年轻。【原文：While advanced economies worry about getting old, Africa is getting younger.】

item.title: 散户交易员在高风险加密货币国债交易中暴露无遗
item.description: 随着投资者的胃口越来越小，高管们开始采用一种新颖的结构来为加密货币积累工具提供资金。【原文：Executives are turning to a novel structure to fund crypto accumulation vehicles as investor appetite thins.】

item.title: 荷兰银行将裁员数千人，以降低成本和推动人工智能发展
item.description: 随着雇主越来越多地采用人工智能并寻求降低成本，荷兰的银行家们正面临着成千上万的裁员。【原文：Bankers in the Netherlands are facing thousands of cuts as their employers increasingly adopt artificial intelligence and seek to trim costs.】

item.title: 阿尔及利亚国旗航空公司增加波音和空客喷气机以推动旅游业发展
item.description: 阿尔及利亚的国有航空公司将在未来几年内接收大约四十几架飞机，因为这个曾经与世隔绝的沙漠国家正试图启动其新生的旅游业。【原文：Algeria’s state-owned carrier is set to receive about four dozen aircraft in the next few years as the once-isolated desert nation tries to jump-start its nascent tourism industry.】

item.title: 中国投资崩溃令经济学家困惑并威胁经济增长
item.description: 中国的投资崩溃是前所未有的，也是难以解释的。【原文：China’s collapsing investment is as unprecedented as it is hard to explain.】

item.title: 华尔街新关税交易显示对退税的疑虑
item.description: 即使美国最高法院推翻了唐纳德-特朗普的全面关税政策，押注政府退税的交易能否获得回报似乎仍存在很大疑问。【原文：Even if the US Supreme Court strikes down Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs, there still appear to be significant doubts that trades betting on government refunds will ever pay out.】

item.title: 里夫斯将冻结而非降低英国所得税门槛
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，将在预算中延长所得税起征点的冻结期，但不会降低起征点。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will extend the freeze to income-tax thresholds at the budget but will not lower them, people familiar with the matter said.】
